info.name: HTTP Howrse Update 5/4 Ad Block Banner Solution
info.description: To Howrse - The solution to the annoying, large ad block banner!!!! Purpose: To remove the Turn off your ad blocker banner at the top of the page and stop the lagging. Extra Info/Changes :: + Flips the navigation bars. + Uses URLs that use hypertext transfer protocol only, please install the HTTPS version also since Howrse sometimes fluctuates between them. + Removes the footer for faster loading times. Please visit my Howrse INT account here! Visit my forum while you are there!
info.additionalInfo:
Change Log

1/22/17 -
I am deciding to not release this style to the public anymore due to Howrse's constant changes and new ad system. You may still download this old version, however, any new corrections will not be updated here. This style is now only for my personal use. Thank you for understanding.

11/14/16 -
Currently working on a new version due to the new changes to the site...

10/18/16 -
Sorry for the long wait, here is the newest edition. Works perfectly for removing the banner again! 

9/29/16 -
I am aware of the new banner position, please be patient while I work on editing the code.

9/5/16 -
After 1 month of testing, Howrse has not come up with any major changes so I have decided to release the Beta. 
Please be aware that this style removes the footer automatically, and must be changed manually if you want it to show.

8/12/16 -
I have a rough beta in process, it shouldn't be too long now! Fixing a few bugs here and there and soon it should be up and running. There will be a few major changes though. I am aware of the promo page glitch, in the midst of fixing that. 

8/11/16 -
I am very aware of the recent code changes in the Howrse site, but due to school I do not have as much time to fix the things that went wrong. Will try to get a working version up ASAP. Thanks for the patience!

8/9/16 -
Removed the large footer at the bottom, for faster page loading times. If you do not want this change, please change the Show Footer? setting to "Yes" 

8/5/16 -
Changed a few classes that Howrse switched, brought header navigation to front.

7/31/16 -
Fixed issue with promotion pages and JavaScript links not working. 

7/24/16 -
Fixed Helios ray height issue, added more space beneath header. Background ambiance images are aligned properly. Also fixed the issue where you could not confirm a new background for a horse. 

7/3/16 - 
Fixed the background images so that they appear instead of being hidden behind the main page.

6/26/16 - 
Howrse switches between http and https. Added HTTPS version, please download if you want banner block at all times. 

6/8/16 - 
Added a few more URLs that I found to not be included. Always finding these!

5/23/16 - 
Noticed glitch // When previewing a Helios Ray background, the "buy" option doesn't show up. 
In process of fixing this.

5/10/16 - 
Tested also in VIP account and everything is fine...

5/6/16 -
*Switches the navigation bar and menu header around. All links still work.
Tested in Chrome on Mac and Windows.

data.title: Great Way to get rid of annoying banner!

url-prefix("http://www.howrse.com/elevage/chevaux/chevauxParadis") { /*   What does this do | Removes banner, switches navigation (top bottom) and shortens the page for faster loading times.   THIS IS THE MAIN AD BLOCK REMOVER CODE SECTION, REMOVE THIS AND YOU LOSE THE POINT OF THIS WHOLE CSS FILE!!!!!!!!!!!  ALL URLS MUST HAVE THIS CODE TO REMOVE THE BASIC BANNER BEFORE ANY OF THE OTHER STYLES CAN BE APPLIED!!  !! If you want the footer to be shown, please go to line 52 and delete the code (visibility: hidden) !!      */      #content { margin-top: 100px; } #cols-wrapper { margin-top: -40px; } #background-ambiance { margin-top: -100px; z-index: -999; } #header.ow-gift::before, #header.ow-gift>div { position: relative !important; display: none !important; } #header::after { content: none !important; display: none !important; clear: none !important; } body.panorama:not(.disconnected) #header.ow-gift::before, body.panorama:not(.disconnected) #header.ow-gift>div { top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 0 !important; height: 0 !important; } #header { top: 10px !important; } #global::before { content: none !important; display: none !important; position: relative !important; left: 0 !important; top: 0 !important; width: 0 !important; height: 0 !important; z-index: -999 !important; } body.panorama:not(.disconnected) #header.ow-gift::before { background-image: none !important; padding: 0 !important; text-align: end !important; } #bannerLoader-728x90 { display: none !important; } #tutoriel-wrapper { display: none !important; } #advertisingAbuseBox { width: 0 !important; } .menu menu-style-0 grid-row { display: none !important; } .header-logo { display: inline !important; left: 0 !important; } .header-marketing description-off { left: 70px !important; } .level-1 hud-logo { width: 5px !important; } .module-pattern.ba-blue-alpha { margin-top: -90px; } .gift{ display:none !important; }  /*Gets rid of footer, replace display none with visibility hidden for extra space to be saved. */  #footer { visibility: hidden; margin: -44px; ; padding: 0; border-radius: 0px; }  /* Extra visual appearance tweaks */  input { background-color: #e8edc6; } }  @-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.howrse.com/operation/") { /*  ONLY FOR PROMO PAGES AND OPERATIONS!!!!  CHANGES FREQUENTLY so code changes come often  */  #content { margin-top:  -193px !important ; } .bloc-status-special { position: relative; margin-top: -106px; padding: 0 60px; z-index: 99999; } none; } body.panorama:not(.disconnected) #header.ow-gift::before { display: none; padding: 10px 190px 0 200px; text-align: center; } #header-menu .menu:first-child { width: 940px; float: left; margin-top: -115px; } a.level-1.level-alone { box-sizing: border-box; padding: 7px; margin-top: -116px; background-color: #3d75a6; border-radius: 5px; } #cols-middle, #container, #content, #header #banner { width: 990px; margin-top: 44px; } .gift{ display:none !important; }  /*Gets rid of footer, remove visibility hidden and margin to SHOW footer. */   #footer { visibility: hidden; margin: -44px; padding: 0; border-radius: 0px; } }  @-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.howrse.com/elevage/chevaux/cheval?id="), url-prefix("http://www.howrse.com/elevage/fiche/?id=") { /*   For publc and text-align: center; } #header-menu { margin-top: -122px; } ul.menu.menu-style-0.grid-row { float: left; margin-top: 66px; } .menu.menu-style-1.float-left.grid-table { float: left; margin-top: -126px; } #header.ow-gift #header-hud { z-index: 0; } a.level-1.level-alone { box-sizing: border-box; padding: 7px; margin-top: -126px; background-color: #3d75a6; border-radius: 5px; } #content { margin-top: 134px !important; } #page-contents { z-index: -0; } .gift{ display:none !important; } #footer { visibility: hidden; margin: -44px; ; padding: 0; border-radius: 0px; } /* For Frost only, brings the snow container behind the horse one */  #paysage-givre { position: absolute; top: -80px; left: 0; z-index: -1; height: 1032px; width: 1700px; opacity: 0; } /* For horses with animations, brings it back a layer to expose navigation */  #animation { overflow: hidden; position: absolute; height: 700px; width: 988px; margin-top: -48px; left: -284px; z-index: 0 !important; } }  @-moz-document
